destination.name: Serengeti National Park
destination.description: Abundance of Big 5, especially the big cats, opportunities to view wildebeest migration aka migration safari.

destination.name: Okavango Delta
destination.description: A variety of tours such as canoe, boat, and classic safaris, waterway paradise, and presence of big 5

destination.name: Oldonyo Sapuk
destination.description: Embark on a private hiking tour to Oldonyo Sapuk from Nairobi. Discover the rich historical significance of this mountain and enjoy a thrilling adventure.

destination.name: Mount Mulanje
destination.description: At around 3,000 meters (about 9,850 feet), the Mulanje Massif dwarfs the lush land that surrounds it. Itâ€™s split in two by the Fort Lister Gap, a broad pass eroded by the Phalombe and Sombani rivers.The mountain is distinguished by giant basins of rock and narrow gullies cut by fast-flowing streams. A strenuous trek leads to magnificent viewpoints.En route, expect to encounter monkeys, hares, voles and a carpet of enchanting wildflowers after the rain. Large numbers of butterflies are another feature.
